translations: 腌猪后腿；胡说； (双陆棋的)全胜；保守派人士（尤指中年男性，英国“脱欧”支持者）
欺骗；腌；(双陆棋中)获全胜

sentences.sentence: For breakfast the next day, it was gammon steak and red capsicum ragout.
sentences.translation: 次日早餐吃的是腌肉排和红辣椒蔬菜炖肉片。

sentences.sentence: Lynda Gammon wrote: "Heaven has gained an angel."
sentences.translation: 琳达·金门写道：“天堂有了一个天使。”

sentences.sentence: More rarely duck, goose, gammon, Turkey or game are eaten.
sentences.translation: 更很少鸭，鹅，金门，火鸡或游戏也吃。
